about.description:
HeavyDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database
that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.

This recipe provides both CUDA enabled and CUDA disabled heavydb
packages.

name: heavydb
raw_recipe:

    - zlib
  run_constrained:
    - arrow-cpp-proc 3.* cpu
test:
  commands:
    - if not exist %PREFIX%\bin\heavydb.exe exit 1
    - if not exist %PREFIX%\bin\initheavy.exe exit 1
    - if not exist %PREFIX%\bin\heavysql.exe exit 1
    - ''
    - heavysql.exe -v
    - ''
about:
  description: 'HeavyDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database

    that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.


    This recipe provides both CUDA enabled and CUDA disabled heavydb

    packages.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/heavyai/heavydb
  doc_url: https://docs.heavy.ai/
  home: https://heavy.ai
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: The HeavyDB database
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - guilhermeleobas
    - pantosik
    - pearu
    - tmostak
    - tupui

about.description:
HeavyDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database
that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.

This recipe provides both CUDA enabled and CUDA disabled heavydb
packages.
